content: it is important to note that the term one skein refers to the yarn used just yarn® worsted value 400g is **875 yards ** if you desire to make this blanket using another yarn you must be aware of the amount of yardage and purchase accordingly this baby blanket will measure approx 31 x 34 inches when finished it requires only one skein of the premier just value 4 medium weight yarn or 875 yds and a size k-10 1/2 6 5 crochet hook easy two row repeat this is a advanced beginner pattern pattern is written using usa crochet terms youtube video here https //www youtube com/watch v=cviwpppbih8&t=1261s
